name: Stickman Karate
description:
If you like martial arts and stickman games, you are on a roll!

Become a karate master now with stickman. You will not only play a fun fighting stickman game but you will also learn real karate moves and their names.

Fight your way to the highest belt!

Featured :
- Original gameplay
- Guided tutorial for each move
- Real karate moves to learn
- Flawless karate move animation
- Funny stickman animation
- FREE

Do you think you can get a black belt?
We dare you!
